page.title: 02CHANGING FACE OF TREFONEN
page.content:
{THE CHANGING FACE OF TREFONEN}
Originally Trefonen was a very small village,not more than three miles from Oswestry. Since then,people have been building more houses and Trefonen has grown considerably larger. The population has risen so high that the old Trefonen school had to be extended.There are now ninety_six children in the school.Martin's stores was also extended and now is something like a mini_supermarket.Most of the building recently has been up the top or higher parts of Trefonen,especially down Hollies lane.A large house is also being built up Martin's bank. People choose Trefonen to live in mainly because it's in the country,but the town is conviently near.Alot more children are moving to Trefonen,so the school is having yet another extension
